code: import"./Lists.css";import DeleteForeverIcon from'@mui/icons-material/DeleteForever';import CheckCircleIcon from'@mui/icons-material/CheckCircle';import CancelIcon from'@mui/icons-material/Cancel';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{Fragment as _Fragment}from"react/jsx-runtime";export const List=_ref=>{let{todolist,handleToggle,handleDelete}=_ref;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(_Fragment,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ul",{className:"list",children:todolist.map(listItem=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("li",{className:listItem.done?"done":'',children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{children:listItem.item}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("span",{className:"actions",children:[listItem.done?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(CancelIcon,{onClick:()=>handleToggle(listItem.id),style:{fontSize:'4.5vh',margin:'auto'}}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(CheckCircleIcon,{onClick:()=>handleToggle(listItem.id),style:{fontSize:'4.5vh',margin:'auto'}}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(DeleteForeverIcon,{onClick:()=>handleDelete(listItem.id),style:{fontSize:'5vh',margin:'auto',paddingLeft:'3vh'}})]})]},listItem.id))})});};export default List;// JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem("TodoList"))
